channel.title: CountDown timers?
channel.description:
Okay, so im currently hosting a server and a few of my players have been asking if there is any way to add a feature that counts down from 60 minutes so they know when to log off so they dont get a rollback when the server restarts.
So I agreed with them and told them id look into it. But the thing is, I have know Idead of how I would do this.
SO if anyone could help me with this I would really appreciate it. Oh and im running a [PI] server.
